title: Mohammed bin Salman | Biography, Saudi Arabia, Father, & Mother | Britannica
snippet: Last updated Dec. 9, 2025 •History Table of Contents · Table of Contents Quick Summary Ask the Chatbot a Question ... Mohammed bin Salman has served as crown prince (2017– ), prime minister (2022– ), and previously as minister of defense (2015–22).

title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: Russia's new foreign policy concept unveiled in 2023 has given priority to enhancing friendly relations with Saudi Arabia. In December 2023, Putin visited Saudi Arabia and met with Mohammed. Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman hosted Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Riyadh on 10 March 2025, ahead of U.S.-Ukraine talks.

title: Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman - Saudi Arabia
snippet: Last updated Dec. 21, 2025 •History ... Mohammed bin SalmanThe son of Salman ibn Abdulaziz, Mohammed bin Salman, became the de facto ruler of Saudi Arabia during his father's reign and, as crown prince, became poised to be the first member of his generation to lead Saudi Arabia.(more)

title: Mohammed bin Salman’s Power and Wealth in 2025
snippet: Mohammed bin Salman, commonly known as MBS, is the Crown Prince and de facto ruler of Saudi Arabia. Appointed heir to the throne in 2017 by his father, King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, MBS has since positioned himself as a dominant force not just in the Gulf but on the global stage.
